import java.util.*;
import java.math.*;
import java.io.*;

public class Main {
	public static void main(String args[]) throws IOException {
		BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
		try	{
			int n = 2500;
double dp[][] = new double[n+2][n+2];
			
			for(int y = 0; y <= n; ++y)	{
				dp[0][y] = (double)y/(double)2;
				dp[1][y] = (double)(y+1)/(double)2;
			}
			
			for(int _x = 2; _x <= n; ++_x)
				for(int _y = 0; _y <= n; ++_y)	{
					double x = _x, y = _y;
					double s = 0;
					if(y >= 0 && x-y >= 0)
						s += (x-y) / (x*(x-1)) * (dp[_x-2][_y] + 1.0);
					if( y >= 1)
						s += y / (x) * (dp[_x-1][_y-1] + 1.0);
					if( y >= 1 && x-y >= 0)
						s += y*(x-y) / (x*(x-1)) * (dp[_x-2][_y] + 2.0);
					if(y >= 0 && x-y >= 2)
						s += (x-y)*(x-y-2) / (x*(x-1)) * (dp[_x-2][_y+2] + 1.0);
					
					dp[_x][_y] = s;
				}
		while(true) {
			String line = br.readLine();
			StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(line);
			
			n = Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken())*Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
			
			
			System.out.printf("%.4f\n", dp[n][0]);
		}
		} catch(Exception e)	{
			return;
		}
	}
}
